nodes.text: Amaya Kymeri was the clan mother of the Howling Crag Clan, a clan of Dathomiri Witches that lived on the planet Dathomir during the Galactic Civil War. Many members of her clan became infected from the outbreak of the blackwing virus, and the Empire began trying to kill most of the clan to contain the outbreak. Kymeri died from this attack, though she later appeared to a spacer as a Force ghost to send the spacer to kill the Sisters of the Void (three infected witches that used spells to survive the attack).

Amaya Kymeri appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
